page.title: 07HOTELS AND INNS IN MAWNAN
page.content: There are six hotels in Mawnan, {Budock Vean}is the biggest and most luxurious. It has many facilities including Tennis Courts, Swimming Pool, and a Golf Course.{Meudon}is a large hotel situated in 8 acres of sub tropical gardens.The West Bay ,{Nansidwell}and{Trelawne}are small family hotels which provide a good service.The{Craig hotel}overlooks Maneporth Beach,but was burnt down in November 1981.It is in the process of being rebuilt and should be open next Easter.The{Sea Horse}Inn over looks Maenporth Beach.Many people think that it is an ugly building which spoils the view .Dionysus is the only restaurant it is Greek.The {Red Lion}is a 16th century thatched pub.5 years ago the bar was enlarged and a childrens room was added.Snacks and salads are served.
